vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Another name of dan (דָּן "Dan" H1835)
§ Laish = "lion"
n pr loc
an early name for Dan, a town in northern Israel
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1)   león ; (2a)   nombre anterior de la ciudad de Dan; (2b)   de Galim; padre de Paltí, quien se casó con Mical, esposa de David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拉億 这个專有名詞 地名在原文的意思是 「獅子」
1) 但早期的名稱, 是以色列北方的城市 ( 士 18:29)
2) 耶路撒冷北方的地名; 地點不詳. 和合本譯為"萊煞人" (賽10:30)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
拉亿 这个专有名词 地名在原文的意思是 「狮子」
1) 但早期的名称, 是以色列北方的城市 ( 士 18:29)
2) 耶路撒冷北方的地名; 地点不详. 和合本译为"莱煞人" (赛10:30)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Sa.25.44;
father of: Palti (H6406H)
Another spelling of lush (לוּשׁ "Laish" H3889)
§ Laish = "lion"
n pr m
father of Phaltiel, the man to whom king Saul gave his daughter Michal in marriage even though she was already married to David

§ Laish = "lion"
n pr loc
a place north of Jerusalem; site unknown
